Okay for Enroute Airport Stop -- Don't Make a Trip Link: /ShowUserReviews-g293999-d485295-r635959229-Holy_Shrine_of_Emam_Khomeini-Tehran_Tehran_Province.html

By the standards of the mosques that Iran has to offer, this was pretty average and didn't really do much for me. Plus, it is pretty new so nothing to really appreciate. I stopped by it on my way from the airport... wouldn't make the hike otherwise.
